name: Notepy
tag_list: notes, reminders, events, projects, calendar, collaboration
overview:
Notepy is a cloud notebook. You can take notes for your study, work, daily life, and access it from anywhere through the Internet.

Types of notebook paper: Notes, Reminders, Events, and more is coming.

Work together: Share and edit the notes with your different networks.

One of the important concepts of Notepy is network. You have different networks, e.g. family, best friends, casual friends, classmates, coworkers, etc. You may want to share different things with different networks. In Notepy, you are able to manage things in networks. The default network is Personal - only you can view and edit things in your Personal Network.
